subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In 2000, Charles B. Wang and Sanjay Kumar bought the New York Islanders and vowed to halt the team’s long fall. Like his predecessors, Wang has fought a losing battle.
snippet: In 2000, Charles B. Wang and Sanjay Kumar bought the New York Islanders and vowed to halt the team’s long fall. Like his predecessors, Wang has fought a losing battle.
